dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
The Score-P measurement infrastructure is a highly scalable and easy-to-
use tool suite for profiling, event tracing, and online analysis of HPC
applications.
dependencies.name: scorep

description:
A suite of communication-intensive proxy applications that mimic
commonly found communication patterns in HPC codes. These codes can be
used as synthetic codes for benchmarking, or for trace generation using
Score-P / OTF2.
name: chatterbug

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
